results.title: Causal association between antidiabetic drugs and erectile dysfunction: evidence from Mendelian randomization.
results.text_hl: Results: In some of the hypoglycemic drug use, there was a significant causal relationship between @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use and @<m>DISEASE_Erectile_Dysfunction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007172 @@@erectile dysfunction@@@ [Beta: 4.9386; OR:1.396E+02 (95% CI:9.13-2135); p-value: 0.0004), suggesting that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ increased the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Erectile_Dysfunction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007172 @@@erectile dysfunction@@@ development.

results.title: Long-acting glucagon-like peptide 1 receptor agonists boost erectile function in men with type 2 diabetes mellitus complaining of erectile dysfunction: A retrospective cohort study.
results.text_hl: DISCUSSION: GLP-1RAs plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ over @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ alone improved @<m>DISEASE_Erectile_Dysfunction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007172 @@@ED@@@ regardless of different background characteristics of patients and partially irrespective of therapeutic targets achieved after 12 months of treatment.

results.title: Effects of Anti-Diabetic Drugs on Erectile Dysfunction: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis.
results.text_hl: Finally, the impact of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonylureas@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Erectile_Dysfunction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007172 @@@ED@@@ remains uncertain, with mixed evidence from existing studies.

results.title: Prevalence and predictors of erectile dysfunction among men in the diabetes prevention program outcomes study.
results.text_hl: In all @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@, age (p < 0.001) increased odds of @<m>DISEASE_Erectile_Dysfunction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007172 @@@ED@@@. Among @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@ with @DISEASE_Prediabetic_State @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@PreD@@@, those assigned to intensive lifestyle intervention (ILS), but not @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, had decreased odds of @<m>DISEASE_Erectile_Dysfunction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007172 @@@ED@@@ compared with the placebo group (OR = 0.35, 95 % CI = 0.13, 0.94).

results.title: The Role of Antihyperglycemic Drugs and Diet on Erectile Function: Results from a Perspective Study on a Population with Prediabetes and Diabetes.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the effect of diet and antihyperglycemic drugs on @<m>DISEASE_Erectile_Dysfunction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007172 @@@erectile dysfunction@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Erectile_Dysfunction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007172 @@@ED@@@) in a setting of subjects affected by @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@ (@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@) or preDM.
